name: DEXO VR
description:
DEXO 拧把打道 is a very fast and skilled arcade game for the HTC vive.

The game uses 4 mechanics (Twist, Hold, Hit, Path). These mechanics are easy to learn with no controls but they are hard to master. You will have to use your reaction speed to get to the top of the leaderboards!

Mechanics:

  • Twist (Twist controller in the area)
  • Hold (Hold controller for 1 second)
  • Hit (Hit controller of area)
  • Path (Follow path using correct numbers)

Features

  • Online Leaderboards
  • 2 Game Modes (Skilled or Speed)
  • Exciting Gameplay
  • Excellent Music and SFX

Thanks for Playing. Please leave feedback!
